texts.helpText:
*The shopping cart of %coloAfterpayBasketAmount% results in a total loan amount of %coloAfterpayInstallmentAmount% when selecting %coloAfterpayNumberOfInstallments% installments.
Debit interest is %coloAfterpayInstallmentInterestRate%% and effective interest rate is %coloAfterpayInstallmentEffectiveInterestRate%%.

The Goods remain the property of the shop until the outstanding claim has been paid in full (retention of title). You do not have to provide Insurance. The rates are collected by direct debit. The option of paying the total amount displayed in the Checkout-Summary (basket value plus shipping) with the here chosen installments (and plus the shown interest above) depends on the condition if a subsequent installment agreement will be agreed upon (thereto more in the AfterPay T&C). The total amount has to be paid in full and no interest will accrue if a subsequent installment agreement will not be agreed on.
texts.example:
Example:
For a purchase of EUR 200.00, a borrowing rate of 14.95% and a repayment plan of 12 steady monthly rates, the effective annual interest rate is 16.02%. Thefore, each monthly repayment rate equals EUR 18.05 and the total costs are EUR 216.60. For the same purchase volume but a repayment plan of 6 steady monthly rates instead, the effective annual interest rate is 15.91%. Each monthly repayment rate then equals EUR 34.80 and the total costs are EUR 208.80.
